	by stagsmtp.subtextdev.org (Postfix) with ESMTPS id 138E8A54042
	for <townlists@stagsmtp.subtextdev.org>; Tue, 21 Apr 2015 11:38:45 -0400 (EDT)

	id 4A4AD27404; Tue, 21 Apr 2015 08:38:44 -0700 (PDT)

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7BIT

2014 wrapped bales. 52 inch, big nice bales. First cut. Net wrapped. $40
loaded on your truck/trailer.  Call 439-6756
---------------------------
You received this message as a subscriber on the Lrn@lists.valley.net discussion list. There are OVER 500 subscribers to the LRN list!!

When replying to a posting, if you receive the list digest, use the "Reply to sender" or "Reply to list" links at the end of the individual message. If you receive each posting as a separate email, use your mail program's Reply or Reply-To-All function, as appropriate. Please edit your reply to include only the relevant portions of the original posting, not the entire email.

All Upper Valley-wide posts should be sent ONLY to uppervalley@lists.valley.net.

Anyone can subscribe to this group by sending a blank message to
Lrn-subscribe@lists.valley.net.
To be removed from this list, send a blank message to
Lrn-unsubscribe@lists.valley.net.

You can contact the list manager at lrn-request@lists.valley.net.
To POST a message to this list, simply email your message to:
lrn@lists.valley.net

For the list homepage with posting guidelines and instructions for changing your subscription options, visit http://lists.valley.net/lists/info/Lrn. The archives with all previous messages posted to this list can be found at http://lists.valley.net/lists/arc/Lrn.

Miscellaneous questions or comments may be forwarded directly to the moderator of this ListServe at: lrn-request@lists.valley.net 

This discussion list is provided at no cost by Vital Communities, a regional nonprofit organization based in White River Junction, Vermont, working to engage citizens, organizations, and communities in creating solutions to our region's challenges. To learn more, go to www.vitalcommunities.org.






--001a113dd5dad6cf7105143dd4c7
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
